File libsrc/libmath/spline.c

Public Function Index

cspline (float *, float *, int, float *, float *)
Compute the cubic spline coefficients for use in the cubic spline interpolation routine splint.
csplint (float *, float *, float *, int, double, float *)
Cubic spline interpolation.

Public Functions

cspline 
 void cspline(float *x,
              float *y,
              int n,
              float *y2,
              float *u)
Compute the cubic spline coefficients for use in the cubic spline interpolation routine splint. (from numerical recipes page 88.) If yp1 and/or ypn are .ge. 1.e+30, the corresponding boundary condition is set for a natural spline, with zero second derivative on that boundary.

Parameters:
x - n coordinate values at which y(x) is tabulated. (with x[i+1] .gt. x[i])
y - n tabulated values y(x).
n - the number of tabulated values.
yp1 - desired first derivative of the interpolating function at x[0].
ypn - desired first derivative of the interpolating function at x[n-1].
y2 - n second derivatives of the interpolating function at the points x[i],i=0,n-1.
u - working space of length n.
csplint 
 void csplint(float *xa,
              float *ya,
              float *y2a,
              int n,
              double x,
              float *y)
Cubic spline interpolation. (from numerical recipes page 89.)

Parameters:
xa - n coordinate values at which ya(xa) is tabulated. (with xa[i+1] .gt. xa[i])
ya - n tabulated values ya(xa).
y2a - n second derivatives of the interpolating function from routine spline.
n - the number of tabulated values.
x - coordinate at which to interpolate.
y - (output) interpolated value.
